Duże korporacje kontrolują ceny na rynku afrykańskim, utrzymując je na niskim poziomie. W 2020 roku Wybrzeże Kości Słoniowej wezwało do wprowadzenia regulowanej minimalnej ceny, a w 2022 roku UE zaostrzyła przepisy. Czy te działania przyniosą sprawiedliwe ceny dla Afryki Zachodniej?

programme.title: Gospodarka Północy
programme.desc: Co mają wspólnego Szwecja, Kanada i Islandia? Zgadza się, są położone wysoko na północy, gdzie panuje śnieg i jest zimno. Ale właśnie ten ekstremalny klimat dał początek całej gamie technologii i innowacyjnych pomysłów, bez których kraje takie jak Islandia i Szwecja nie byłyby konkurencyjne. Wybierz się z nami w podróż po gospodarce Północy.

programme.desc: Dokument w wersji z polskim lektorem. Inicjatywa Pasa i Drogi to sieć handlowa pomiędzy Azją, Europą i Afryką. Ponad 70 krajów jest obecnie częścią tej sieci. Inicjatywa Pasa i Drogi jest uważana za centralny punkt polityki zagranicznej sekretarza generalnego Komunistycznej Partii Chin Xi Jinpinga. Chiński rząd nazywa inicjatywę "próbą poprawy regionalnej łączności i dążenia do lepszej przyszłości." Niektórzy obserwatorzy widzą w niej plan chińskiej dominacji na świecie poprzez skoncentrowaną na Chinach globalną sieć handlową. Projekt ma zostać ukończony do 2049 roku, co zbiega się z setną rocznicą powstania Chińskiej Republiki Ludowej.

Ale na Wschodzie także pojawiają się innowacje i postęp technologiczny. Czy to podróże kosmiczne w Rosji, czy pionierzy robotyki w Japonii, wszyscy oni próbują zdobyć innowacyjną przewagę konkurencyjną. Wybierz się z nami w podróż po gospodarczym Wschodzie.

programme.title: Gospodarka w Fazie Przejściowej
programme.desc: Przyszłość jest niepewna i pełna wyzwań. Jak ratować nasze miasta i zwalczać nierówności? Jak poradzimy sobie ze starzejącym się społeczeństwem? Jak poradzić sobie z nierównością płac? Nadszedł czas na myślenie o przyszłości.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Nancy Seaman doesn't denied killing her husband Robert with a hatchet; either she planned it or the murder was a desperate attempt to save her own life after, what she claims, was three decades of physical and emotional abuse.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Years after being found not guilty of the murders of Nicole Brown Simpson and Ron Goldman, O.J. Simpson was back in a courtroom and again facing felony charges.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: A dead woman is found in a park. It's learned the deceased is a divorced landlady of a group home for transients.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.sub-title: S13 : E22 Four Legs Beats Two Legs
programme.desc: A suspect on a stolen motorcycle is apprehended with the assistance of the K-9 unit. An Officer responds to a domestic disturbance call after a woman "accidentally" stabs her boyfriend. A hazardous meth lab is busted.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E07 No Money, More Problems
programme.desc: A woman hides in her apartment after she skips out on paying her cab fare. A knife fight results in multiple calls to the police for help. A French tourist get a bus ride from Hell in Florida.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers get a tip and locate the suspect in a recent shooting. A woman is questioned when she is found parked alone in her car behind closed businesses. Officers respond to a call involving juveniles spray painting an electrical box.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies search a suspicious vehicle behind a strip club. A man threatens to shoot employees at a car rental company. A man tosses lip balm filled with narcotics out the window during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver leads police on a slow speed chase towards Las Vegas. Three people are suspected of using contraband. A multi-neighbor dispute devolves into a fight involving guns and bats.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Agents of the US Customs and Border Protection pursue a vehicle. Border agents spot two undocumented people while scanning train tracks. Airport Customs detains a man when agents suspect he might be carrying more than luggage.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E04 No Respect these Days
programme.desc: A combative man at a fast food restaurant claims his phone was stolen. Multiple illegal items are found on a man parked on the side of the road. An intoxicated man throws an 83-year-old’s walker.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A patrolman plays linebacker when a fleeing thief runs right into him. Armed-robbery victims give a colorful play-by-play on surveillance footage of the crime. Officers have to get tearful children back to their estranged mother.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A feisty cyclist gives a team of officers a bloody fight. A scared caregiver attempts to evict an unwanted helper from her patient’s house. Mysterious tinfoil lands an unlicensed driver in hot water.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E02 Who Let the Dogs Out
programme.desc: Officers deploy a police K-9 when a burglary suspect takes refuge in a lemon tree. A suspect on the run seeks shelter in a stranger’s house. A biker with a suspended license just doesn’t know how to listen.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A bicyclist ends up on the pavement when he tries to out pedal a patrol car. A messy divorce leads to a gun-toting showdown between a Corvette and a Mustang. An angry dog ends up getting the best of a domestic dispute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E06 Sharp Knives and Dirty Donuts
programme.desc: A customer pulls out a knife when asked to leave the store. A man doing donuts in a motel parking lot is questioned about a love triangle. Officers are flagged down by a man who was shot at while riding his bike.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers in Las Vegas make an arrest in a grand theft auto call with the help of the K9 unit. An uncooperative driver takes off in the middle of a traffic stop. A woman in Florida is rewarded for her honesty and is let go as her friends are arrested.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers coax a man off a large construction crane. An inebriated man is jailed for domestic abuse. A man is rescued from a flash flood, but his truck isn’t so lucky.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers investigate two vehicles involved in an accident. Officers respond to a call involving a man with a knife. Officers respond to a call involving a man with a gun at a convenience store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two juveniles involved in a carjacking. Two men sitting in a truck are spotted hiding something in the console. A man claims he took drug paraphernalia from kids as a good samaritan.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue an SUV on the freeway. Deputies are called after an agitated man arms himself with scissors. A driver tells officers the illegal items found in his car was left by a friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E15 All The World's Our Bedroom
programme.desc: Officers are called to remove a man sleeping in a parking spot at Wal-Mart. A free-spirited couple takes their relationship to their front lawn. A resident brings a knife to a meeting with his building property manager.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Instead of facing the music, a suspect flees from officers down an embankment. A suspect takes a walk through the neighborhood with a BB gun. A innocent pedestrian gets more than she bargained for when she’s hit in a two vehicle collision.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high-speed chase ends when the suspect plays chicken with a concrete pole. An emotional man just wants the cops to give him a little kiss. A melee breaks out when a woman seizes her beau's cell phone.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect goes out to get his haircut and winds up in jail. Officers try to piece together a puzzling street fight between a boxer and his confused friend. Cops give a suspect every chance to admit to his obvious crime.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E13 I Take This Criminal
programme.desc: During an arrest, a suspect decides to pop the question to his girlfriend. An abandoned house becomes the target of burglary. Two brothers’ dispute over a business matter leads to violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man throws out his narcotics during a foot-chase with police. A woman is arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Officers call for back-up after a woman is held at knife-point.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E17 Rocks in my Socks
programme.desc: Deputies discover a purse and a sock containing paraphernalia during an arrest. Deputies pursue an intoxicated motorcyclist. A woman is suspected of stealing a cake.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A carjacking results in a chase and a flipped vehicle. Suspects crash a truck after attempting to steal beer. A man attempts to swallow his drugs during a bust.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E16 Can't Run from Motorola
programme.desc: A suspect attempts to discard drugs during a foot chase. A man fails to pull over for minor infraction and then bails out his car on foot. A man is arrested after being spotted in a drug transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E05 Put Your Clothes Back On
programme.desc: Cops try desperately to get an unclothed man to cooperate. After a chase with a pickup truck, officers find a 14-year-old in the driver’s seat. On a routine traffic stop, police contend with a plethora of dope and even more lies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect ditches his bike then tries to outrun the police. Neighbors fight about a road rage incident using rocks and a baseball bat. Suspects in a stopped car attempt to hide all the evidence against them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drunk driver rams into a pursuing police car. A man on a bike flees an area known for drug activity on a bike. A sniffling man attempts to hide a baggie with narcotics under his shirt.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A speedy suspect makes officers chase him through a creek. A teenage Good Samaritan gets in the middle of a bizarre domestic dispute. After a woman destroys her home, she begs police to arrest her.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A truck driver decides to hide from police in the last place they’ll look: his own house. A man out on a beer run is robbed at knifepoint. In Portland a man decides to go nude for a bike ride.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer pulls over an erratic driver while on the way to a shots fired call. An officer attempts to stop a resistant motorcyclist. Officers respond to a domestic violence call involving an intoxicated man and a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E01 Young and the Restless
programme.desc: Officers arrest a man suspected of robbery. A riot erupts at a juvenile party on the beach. Officers find an intoxicated man stuck on an iron fence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E19 One for the Road
programme.desc: A man crashes his vehicle after losing control while attempting to evade the police. An elderly woman with an outstanding DUI warrant is arrested for hit and run. Officers discover methamphetamine while investigating two suspicious vehicles on the side of the road.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect flees police in a truck over a misdemeanor traffic warrant. A man denies hitting his wife who has a bloody nose. A man denies ownership of his shorts when deputies find drugs in them.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck
programme.desc: Poznaj Toma, wynalazcę z Samochodzikowa! W swoim nowoczesnym laboratorium tworzy wynalazki, aby rozwiązać problemy przyjaciół.

programme.title: Tom's Garage
programme.desc: Tom the Tow Truck pomaga swoim przyjaciołom z Car City, gdy ci potrzebują naprawy. Zawsze daje im coś specjalnego po każdej pracy.

programme.title: Tom's Paint Shop

programme.title: Healthy Meals!
programme.desc: On this episode, we show you how eating healthy can still be delicious with some Tastemade healthy recipes!

programme.title: Dishes of the World!
programme.desc: On this episode, we're going global with some of our favorite recipes from Europe, Asia and Africa!

programme.title: Dinner Party!
programme.desc: On this episode, we help you plan your next big dinner party with some of our favorite three-course recipes!

programme.title: Meat Lovers!
programme.desc: On this episode, we serve up our favorite meat-themed recipes and learn some fun food facts along the way!

programme.title: Latin Lovers... Of Food!
programme.desc: On this episode, we're featuring some of our favorite Latin-inspired recipes for you to try at home!

programme.title: Spring Fling
programme.desc: Spring Fling is here! We're going to show you some recipes to enjoy some well deserved time in the sun.

programme.title: Restaurant-Style Whole Roast Fish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale grills to impress with a fancy-looking yet easy-to-make whole roasted fish with watermelon salad.

programme.title: Beer Brats & BBQ Ribs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up cheddar beer brats, BBQ lamb ribs, watermelon soju punch, & warm crispy donuts.

programme.title: Bougie Badass Burgers
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde goes big with a dry-aged beef burger, a pork patty melt, & a crunchy mushroom tortilla burger.

programme.title: Feast of Killer Crab & Perfect Pork Belly
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde makes a fierce feast with chili crab, adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, & stuffed branzino.

programme.title: Luxe Lobster & Prime Rib
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde preps perfect prime rib, lobster in chili sauce, charred green beans, & cheddar-stuffed rolls.

programme.title: Summer Seafood Smorgasbord
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde serves up shrimp cocktail, breaded clams, king crab with butter, and a mango frozen daiquiri.

programme.title: Baked With Pride
programme.desc: Mia Starr celebrates Pride Month with a Baked Alaska, a Fruit Tart, a Citrus Cake, and a Rainbow Crepe Cake.

programme.title: Cabbage, cabbage, cabbage
programme.desc: Cabbage has never been cooler than right now, proving to be the utility ingredient we never knew we needed.

programme.title: Mayo: The Secret Ingredient
programme.desc: Frankie unlocks mayo’s secret powers that take your recipes to the next level, all without leaving a trace.

programme.title: Warm + Cozy Winter
programme.desc: Frankie gets cozy with recipes that bring warmth, flavor and joy to the kitchen on the coldest winter days.

programme.title: Struggle Soup
programme.desc: Follow Frankie’s blueprints for building a hit soup that will have you returning for seconds all year round.

programme.title: Struggle Sandwich
programme.desc: Every layer counts as Frankie ups the ante on classic sandwiches, with homemade twists that steal the show.

programme.title: Vintage
programme.desc: Frankie shows us that vintage doesn’t have to break the bank with these classic, oldie-but-goodie recipes.

programme.title: Crunchy
programme.desc: There’s nothing like a satisfying crunch to up your recipe game; bonus points for not bursting your budget.

programme.desc: Tulip fields as seen from a drone perspective in the windmill-filled country of Holland.

programme.title: America From Above
programme.desc: Part one of a new series of ambient drone films for relaxation, America From Above is a spectacular yet ultra-soothing 1-hour long natural journey that sweeps viewers gently above America's vistas. You'll begin the farmlands of Iowa, soaring west through the Rocky Mountains of Colorado, then on to Utah's iconic red rock landscapes and finally ending on the West Coast with a familiar voyage over Big Sur and then back to San Diego just in time for sunset.

programme.title: Oahu Morning Waves
programme.desc: Relax on the shores of Oahu, Hawaii just after sunrise, where big blue waves crash in golden sunlight. The scene has been seamlessly looped for a full hour length, perfect for transporting your TV screen or digital device into a window to paradise!Perfect as a backdrop for meditation, yoga, relaxing, reading, or just as an idyllic flowing screensaver!

programme.title: Return to Paradise 1
programme.desc: Featuring the hidden exotic Fijian island of Nanuku, a tiny, palm-covered, sandy atoll surrounded by lagoons brimming with sea life; some aerial drone clips give perspective from above.

programme.title: Good Morning
programme.desc: A view of Playa Madama, an unspoiled beach framed by high bluffs at the edge of the Dominican Republic.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Unwind Banyan Tree, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at the Banyan Tree resort. She tries water sports, learns a traditional Maldivian recipe, rejuvenates herself at a spa and ends her day by exploring the capital city of Male.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Viajar Peru Ica Nazca
programme.desc: Milagros’s first stop to showcase her country is at Ica on Peru’s southern coast known for its vineyards and for the desert oasis, Huacachina.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass North Cape, Norway
programme.desc: Famous journalist and explorer, Jamie Lowe visits the unofficial capital of the Northern Lights in Norway, Alta, where he encounters the two most exciting experiences the place has to offer: he witnesses the Aurora Borealis and he visits the UNESCO-listed Alta Museum with its rock carvings dating back to 7000 years ago. To get the full winter experience, he also tries reindeer sledding, spends a night at Sorrisniva ice hotel, and visits North Cape, the northernmost point of Europe.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: On a journey to find the lost and forgotten recipes of India, Alex finds herself at Asia’s biggest spice market.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alexandra, in this episode visits Dubrovnik, where she explores a war museum, the dramatic monuments, mesmerising landscapes and tries water sports.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 City Breaks Frankfurt, Germany
programme.desc: Frankfurt is the financial capital of the European Union. Kristina discovers that the city has much more to offer than just a good business meeting, as she learns about its history and architecture through its famous sights such as the Kaizerdom Cathedral and the Eltz Castle. She also goes to Rudesheim, where she encounters an amazing collection of data operated music instruments.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: In Arequipa, Milagros has set out to peel back the layers of her country’s history.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Boarding Pass Tromso, Norway
programme.desc: Jamie Lowe visits Tromsø, the gateway to the Arctic, where he gets to know the Arctic ways of life. He enjoys a reindeer burger, tries his hand at ice fishing, and gets a taste of the culture and cuisine of the Sami, the original inhabitants of the Arctic. He also goes to Bodø, where he witnesses one of the intense whirlpools created by Saltstraumen, one of the fastest tidal currents in the world.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From a rich lamb curry to a hearty pulao made with rare mushrooms, Alex learns to make the secret recipes of a local family in Delhi.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Backpack, Brac and Split Croatia
programme.desc: Stay tuned with Alex to find out what Barc, the coastal town of Croatia, has to offer a backpacker. She tries quad biking.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 City Breaks Brussels, Belgium
programme.desc: Six hundred years ago, Brussels was just a nice place to stop and buy a waffle on the way to France. Exploring the capital of Belgium today, Catriona realizes that it’s a city where the historic Grand Palace and a hip museum of the world’s oldest and latest cars co-exist. It’s the city where the quirkiness of Mannekin-Pis meets the futuristic approach seen in the Atomium. It’s the city where traditional Belgian chocolates can be savored after a visit to the multicultural Mini Europe park.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Amidst the sapphire expanse of Lake Titicaca, Milagros embarks on a journey of reconnecting with her roots. Delving into the secrets of the Uros, she unveils their timeless artistry in building floating islands, a testament to human resilience. But as she travels to Amantani Island, an enigma awaits—a forgotten temple, rituals that date back to the pre-Incan times, chapters of Peru’s lesser-explored history waiting to unfold.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Boarding Pass Polar Park, Norway
programme.desc: The world’s northernmost animal park, the Polar Park in Bardu, nearby Tromsø, is home to many of Norway’s predators, and Jamie Lowe sees a few of them such as the lynx and the bear, but the most exciting experience he has is getting up, close and personal with wolves at the park. He also tries husky sledding.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From papad ka paratha to lehsun ki kheer, Chef Aditya Jaimini shows Alex Outhwaite how to make some of the unusual dishes from Indian cuisine.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Backpack Split and Salona, Croatia
programme.desc: Explore the beautiful Dalmatian coast with a little history of Split with Alex and stay tuned as next she explores the port city of Salona.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Great World Hotels Closenberg, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Great World Hotels Closenberg, Sri Lanka

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Milagros visits the ancient city of Cusco just in time for the legendary Inti Raymi Festival, a gateway to the Inca empire's beliefs. Hidden in the vibrant festivities, which continue into the night, are glimpses into the lives led by the people during the Inca era.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Boarding Pass Bronnoysund, Norway
programme.desc: The small coastal settlement of Brønnøysund is flanked on one side by an archipelago of islets and on the other by rolling farm country, and Jamie Lowe experiences the best of both worlds during his visit. He goes hiking in Trollfjel Geopark, visits a sea cave and learns about the folklore surrounding the Troll mountains. He also visits a local farmhouse to learn about life in the Norwegian countryside, and goes on to try cod fishing.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Amritsar,where recipes have been passed down generations. Alex explores it in Quest.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Watch a musical instrument powered by sea waves and learn how glassware was made in Roman era. This and more with Alexandra in Zadar episode

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Great World Hotels Le Telfair Heritage, Mauritius
programme.desc: An invigorating body massage, fresh seafood with rum, kayaking - Freishia enjoys finding out the ways in which Mauritius pampers its visitors.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Cyprus Akamas National Park
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Viajar Peru Inca Valley & Machu Picchu
programme.desc: Scaling rocks and defying heights, Milagros finds herself suspended 1200 feet above the ground at the Sacred Valley of the Incas.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Roros, Norway
programme.desc: Røros, a historical Norwegian copper mining town full of impeccable wooden buildings, is a place that makes you travel back in time. Jamie Lowe strolls around the quaint town and checks out the mining museum to learn about the town’s fascinating history. Following this, he goes through Lærdal Tunnel, the world’s longest road tunnel, on his way to Flåm. Upon reaching, he goes to the Flåm Railway Museum, where he gets to know the exciting stories behind building the world's steepest railway.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: You won't find anything more comforting than food made from scratch.Join Alex in Hoshiarpur as she finds old cuisines.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Backpack, Plitvice Lopar and Zagreb Croatia
programme.desc: Alexandra in this episode explores Plitvice, where she visits a national park, interacts with locals, tastes local wine and then leaves for Zagreb.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: From the impact of maritime trade and the European Renaissance on Portugal in the 15th century to the nationwide Romanticism movement in the 19th century, the heritage sites of Portugal such as Jeronimo Monastery and Pena Palace reveal various stages of the country’s evolution.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Xp Guide Oslo 1, Norway
programme.desc: With a rich history dating back to over 1000 years, Oslo’s iconic monuments reveal its evolution through the ages to visitors.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 World Spas Gaya Island Resort, Malaysia
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries a massage inspired by the waves of the sea and a chocolate vanilla body wrap at the Gaya Island Resort in Malaysia.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Embarking on a homecoming adventure in the heart of the Peruvian Amazonas, Milagros explores her roots like never before.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Boarding Pass Flam, Norway
programme.desc: Flåm is an idyllic town sitting in a spectacular setting at the head of Aurlandsfjorden. Here, Jamie Lowe takes a train ride filled with breathtaking views along Flåmsbana, the world’s steepest railway line. He also takes a cruise to see the stunning UNESCO-listed fjord, Nærøyfjord, and goes on to experience the cuisine and ways of life of the Vikings in Njardarheimr, a Viking village in nearby Gudvangen.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: On a journey to find the lost and forgotten recipes of India, Alex finds herself at Asia’s biggest spice market.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alexandra, in this episode visits Dubrovnik, where she explores a war museum, the dramatic monuments, mesmerising landscapes and tries water sports.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Viajar Peru Ica Nazca
programme.desc: Milagros’s first stop to showcase her country is at Ica on Peru’s southern coast known for its vineyards and for the desert oasis, Huacachina.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass North Cape, Norway
programme.desc: Famous journalist and explorer, Jamie Lowe visits the unofficial capital of the Northern Lights in Norway, Alta, where he encounters the two most exciting experiences the place has to offer: he witnesses the Aurora Borealis and he visits the UNESCO-listed Alta Museum with its rock carvings dating back to 7000 years ago. To get the full winter experience, he also tries reindeer sledding, spends a night at Sorrisniva ice hotel, and visits North Cape, the northernmost point of Europe.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 City Breaks Frankfurt, Germany
programme.desc: Frankfurt is the financial capital of the European Union. Kristina discovers that the city has much more to offer than just a good business meeting, as she learns about its history and architecture through its famous sights such as the Kaizerdom Cathedral and the Eltz Castle. She also goes to Rudesheim, where she encounters an amazing collection of data operated music instruments.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From a rich lamb curry to a hearty pulao made with rare mushrooms, Alex learns to make the secret recipes of a local family in Delhi.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Backpack, Brac and Split Croatia
programme.desc: Stay tuned with Alex to find out what Barc, the coastal town of Croatia, has to offer a backpacker. She tries quad biking.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: In Arequipa, Milagros has set out to peel back the layers of her country’s history.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Boarding Pass Tromso, Norway
programme.desc: Jamie Lowe visits Tromsø, the gateway to the Arctic, where he gets to know the Arctic ways of life. He enjoys a reindeer burger, tries his hand at ice fishing, and gets a taste of the culture and cuisine of the Sami, the original inhabitants of the Arctic. He also goes to Bodø, where he witnesses one of the intense whirlpools created by Saltstraumen, one of the fastest tidal currents in the world.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 City Breaks Brussels, Belgium
programme.desc: Six hundred years ago, Brussels was just a nice place to stop and buy a waffle on the way to France. Exploring the capital of Belgium today, Catriona realizes that it’s a city where the historic Grand Palace and a hip museum of the world’s oldest and latest cars co-exist. It’s the city where the quirkiness of Mannekin-Pis meets the futuristic approach seen in the Atomium. It’s the city where traditional Belgian chocolates can be savored after a visit to the multicultural Mini Europe park.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From papad ka paratha to lehsun ki kheer, Chef Aditya Jaimini shows Alex Outhwaite how to make some of the unusual dishes from Indian cuisine.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Backpack Split and Salona, Croatia
programme.desc: Explore the beautiful Dalmatian coast with a little history of Split with Alex and stay tuned as next she explores the port city of Salona.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Amidst the sapphire expanse of Lake Titicaca, Milagros embarks on a journey of reconnecting with her roots. Delving into the secrets of the Uros, she unveils their timeless artistry in building floating islands, a testament to human resilience. But as she travels to Amantani Island, an enigma awaits—a forgotten temple, rituals that date back to the pre-Incan times, chapters of Peru’s lesser-explored history waiting to unfold.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Boarding Pass Polar Park, Norway
programme.desc: The world’s northernmost animal park, the Polar Park in Bardu, nearby Tromsø, is home to many of Norway’s predators, and Jamie Lowe sees a few of them such as the lynx and the bear, but the most exciting experience he has is getting up, close and personal with wolves at the park. He also tries husky sledding.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Great World Hotels Closenberg, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Great World Hotels Closenberg, Sri Lanka

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Amritsar,where recipes have been passed down generations. Alex explores it in Quest.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Watch a musical instrument powered by sea waves and learn how glassware was made in Roman era. This and more with Alexandra in Zadar episode

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Milagros visits the ancient city of Cusco just in time for the legendary Inti Raymi Festival, a gateway to the Inca empire's beliefs. Hidden in the vibrant festivities, which continue into the night, are glimpses into the lives led by the people during the Inca era.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Boarding Pass Bronnoysund, Norway
programme.desc: The small coastal settlement of Brønnøysund is flanked on one side by an archipelago of islets and on the other by rolling farm country, and Jamie Lowe experiences the best of both worlds during his visit. He goes hiking in Trollfjel Geopark, visits a sea cave and learns about the folklore surrounding the Troll mountains. He also visits a local farmhouse to learn about life in the Norwegian countryside, and goes on to try cod fishing.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Great World Hotels Le Telfair Heritage, Mauritius
programme.desc: An invigorating body massage, fresh seafood with rum, kayaking - Freishia enjoys finding out the ways in which Mauritius pampers its visitors.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: You won't find anything more comforting than food made from scratch.Join Alex in Hoshiarpur as she finds old cuisines.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Backpack, Plitvice Lopar and Zagreb Croatia
programme.desc: Alexandra in this episode explores Plitvice, where she visits a national park, interacts with locals, tastes local wine and then leaves for Zagreb.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Cyprus Akamas National Park
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Viajar Peru Inca Valley & Machu Picchu
programme.desc: Scaling rocks and defying heights, Milagros finds herself suspended 1200 feet above the ground at the Sacred Valley of the Incas.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Roros, Norway
programme.desc: Røros, a historical Norwegian copper mining town full of impeccable wooden buildings, is a place that makes you travel back in time. Jamie Lowe strolls around the quaint town and checks out the mining museum to learn about the town’s fascinating history. Following this, he goes through Lærdal Tunnel, the world’s longest road tunnel, on his way to Flåm. Upon reaching, he goes to the Flåm Railway Museum, where he gets to know the exciting stories behind building the world's steepest railway.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: From the impact of maritime trade and the European Renaissance on Portugal in the 15th century to the nationwide Romanticism movement in the 19th century, the heritage sites of Portugal such as Jeronimo Monastery and Pena Palace reveal various stages of the country’s evolution.
